title: Sexy Soldiers
description:
In 2030, the Republic of Korea is still a divided country. 

Kang Min Doo, the internet loser, can not avoid an army!

On the first day of enlistment, the sudden headquarters command is transferred to the Special Forces 1004 units, the so-called 'Fleet troops'.  The women who are going to eat Kang Min Doo!  
2 Distinguished pastors with the successors of the dormitories! 1004 units Cheongil-dong Kang Min-duo is going through a period of vigorous duty.

You have to stand! We lie down!

matches.title: My Sister Has Amnesia— What's Sex?
